text:
Alan Wray Tudyk (born March 16, 1971) is an American actor. He played Hoban "Wash" Washburne in "Firefly", Doc Potter in ' and as Dutch in '. On voice acting, he voiced Lenny in "Ice Age" and other Disney characters in each movies and television.
Tudyk was born in El Paso, Texas. Tudyk was raised in Plano, Texas. He studied at Plane Senior High School, Lon Morris High School, and at the Juilliard School.
